header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED IN GRAND COMMITTEE

text.quote: 000: Clause 3, page 2, line 32, at end insert—
“(4) Directions under subsection (1) must be given by order made by statutory instrument.

(5) A statutory instrument that contains an order made under subsection (4) is not to be made unless a draft of the instrument has been laid before, and approved by a resolution of, each House of Parliament.”
000: Clause 6, page 5, line 12, at end insert—
“( ) In section 140 (orders, rules and regulations), in subsection (3), after paragraph (a) insert—
000: Clause 36, page 29, line 43, leave out paragraph (g)
000: Clause 44, page 34, line 27, leave out paragraph (b)
000: Clause 107, page 114, line 36, after “legislation” insert “, or a statutory instrument containing an order under section 4,”
000: Clause 107, page 114, line 36, after “legislation” insert “, or a statutory instrument containing an order under section 49,”
000: Clause 107, page 114, line 36, after “legislation” insert “, or a statutory instrument containing an order under section 51(4),”
000: Clause 107, page 114, line 36, after “legislation” insert “, or a statutory instrument containing an order under sections 54, 55,”
